name: Thruster (itch)
description:
Thruster is all about testing your flying skills to the max! With 10 awsome levels Thruster is fun and will keep you playing for hours on end. You play as a skilled rocket pilot, flying through rocky terrain. The game is dificult, and when you die you have to restart the game, unless your playing on easy mode, in this case you will respaw on the same level you died. This game consits on low polly textures and other cool desings. The music for the game was made by Evan King, Everything else was created by RRgamer.

Enjoy!
